mapper.select: select * from og_person where mobil_phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and invalidation_mark = '1'
select * from og_person where mobil_phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and invalidation_mark = '1'

select p.pid,p.birthplace, p.pname,p.sex,p.mobil_phone,p.phone,p.position,p.leader,p.p_order,p.p_flag,p.email,p.orgid,og.orgname,og.level_code from og_person p left join og_org og on p.orgid = og.orgid where p.invalidation_mark = 1 and p.pid not in (select u.pid from og_user u where u.invalidation_mark='1')
and p.pname like concat('%',concat(#{ogPerson.pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and p.mobil_phone like concat('%',concat(#{ogPerson.mobilPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and og.LEVEL_CODE like concat('%',concat(#{ogPerson.levelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))

select p.pid,p.birthplace,p.pname,p.sex,p.mobil_phone,p.phone,p.position,p.leader, p.p_order,p.p_flag,p.email,p.orgid,og.orgname,og.level_code,u.username from og_person p left join og_user u on p.pid=u.pid left join og_org og on p.orgid = og.orgid where p.invalidation_mark = 1
and og.level_code like concat(concat(#{levelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))

select p.pid as value, case when p.email is null or p.email='' then p.pname else concat(concat(concat(p.pname,'('),substring_index(p.email,'@',1)),')') end as label from og_person p left join og_org og on p.orgid = og.orgid left join og_org o on p.partake_org_id = o.orgid where p.pname is not null
select p.pid,p.birthplace, p.pname,p.sex,p.mobil_phone,p.phone,p.position,p.leader,p.p_order,p.p_flag,p.email,p.orgid from og_person p where p.orgid like concat(concat('%',#{orgId}),'%')

select p.memo, p.pid, p.pname, p.birthplace, p.email, p.address, p.birthday, p.orgId, p.edu, p.sex, p.mobil_phone, p.phone, p.position, p.leader, p.p_order, p.p_flag, o.orgname, o.orgid, u.userid, p.agency_pid, p.agency_pname, p.agency_switch, p.agency_strtime, p.agency_endtime, p.partake_org_id from og_person p left join OG_ORG o on p.orgid = o.orgid LEFT JOIN og_user u on u.pid = p.pid where p.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' and p.pid = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select distinct p.* from OG_USER u,OG_PERSON p,OG_ORG a,OG_R_USER_POST up,OG_R_POST_ROLE pr
where u.PID = p.PID and p.ORGID = a.ORGID and u.USERID = up.USERID and up.POSTID = pr.POSTID
AND p.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' AND u.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' AND pr.RID = #{param2} and a.LEVEL_CODE like concat(#{param1},'%')

select u.username,u.userid,u.INVALIDATION_MARK,pe.pname,pe.mobil_phone,og.orgname,u.pid,pe.sex from OG_USER u left join OG_PERSON pe on u.pid = pe.pid left join og_org og on pe.orgid = OG.orgid LEFT join og_r_user_post up on u.userid = up.userid LEFT JOIN og_post p on p.postid = up.postid left join OG_R_POST_ROLE pr on pr.postid = p.postid left join og_role r on r.rid=pr.rid where p.invalidation_mark = '1' and r.rid ='1202' and u.userid = #{userId}
mapper.update:
update og_person
orgid = #{orgId}, pname = #{pName}, sex = #{sex},
edu = #{edu},
edu = '',
birthday = #{birthday},
birthday = '',
birthplace = #{birthPlace},
birthplace = '',
phone = #{phone},
phone = '',
email = #{email},
email = '',
address = #{address},
address = '',
moder = #{moder},
moder = '',
memo = #{memo},
memo = '',
update_time = #{updatetime}, invalidation_mark = #{invalidationMark},
position = #{position},
position = '',
leader = #{leader}, p_order = #{pOrder}, p_flag = #{pflag}, agency_pid = #{agencyPid}, agency_pname = #{agencyPname}, agency_switch = #{agencySwitch}, agency_strtime = #{agencyStrTime}, agency_endtime = #{agencyEndTime}, mobil_phone = #{mobilPhone}, partake_org_id = #{partakeOrgId}, pid_crc = #{pid_crc}
where pid = #{pId}
mapper.select:
select p.memo,p.pid, p.pname,p.birthplace,p.email,p.address,p.birthday,p.orgId,p.edu,p.sex,p.mobil_phone,p.phone,p.position,p.leader,p.p_order,p.p_flag,p.invalidation_mark from og_person p where p.pid in
#{id}

select p.memo,p.pid, p.pname,p.birthplace,p.email,p.address,p.birthday,p.orgId,p.edu,p.sex,p.mobil_phone,p.phone,p.position,p.leader,p.p_order,p.p_flag,p.invalidation_mark from og_person p where p.orgid = #{orgid} and p.leader = '1'

select p.memo,p.pid, p.pname,p.birthplace,p.email,p.address,p.birthday,p.orgId,p.edu,p.sex,p.mobil_phone,p.phone,p.position,p.leader,p.p_order,p.p_flag,p.invalidation_mark from og_person p where p.orgid = #{orgid}

select p.memo,p.pid, p.pname,p.birthplace,p.email,p.address,p.birthday,p.orgId,p.edu,p.sex,p.mobil_phone,p.phone,p.position,p.leader,p.p_order,p.p_flag,p.invalidation_mark from og_person p where p.pid in
#{id}

select distinct p.*,ORGNAME ,u.userid from OG_USER u, OG_PERSON p, OG_ORG a, OG_R_USER_POST up, OG_R_POST_ROLE pr where u.PID = p.PID and p.ORGID = a.ORGID and u.USERID = up.USERID and up.POSTID = pr.POSTID AND p.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' AND u.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1'
AND pr.RID = #{rId}
and p.pname like concat(concat('%',#{pName}),'%')
and a.ORGNAME like concat(concat('%',#{orgname}),'%')

select distinct p.*,ORGNAME ,u.userid as userid from OG_USER u, OG_PERSON p, OG_ORG a, OG_R_USER_POST up, OG_R_POST_ROLE pr where u.PID = p.PID and p.ORGID = a.ORGID and u.USERID = up.USERID and up.POSTID = pr.POSTID AND p.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' AND u.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1'
AND pr.RID = #{rId}
and p.pname like concat(concat('%',#{pName}),'%')
and a.ORGNAME like concat(concat('%',#{orgname}),'%')

select DISTINCT p.memo,p.pid, p.pname,p.birthplace,p.email,p.address,p.birthday,p.orgid,p.edu,p.sex,p.mobil_phone, p.phone,p.position,p.leader,p.p_order,p.p_flag,o.orgname from og_person p, og_r_user_post up, og_user u,og_org o
and p.pid = u.pid and up.userid = u.userid and p.orgid=o.orgid
and o.level_code LIKE concat(#{params.levelCode},'%')
and up.postid in
#{postId}

select distinct u.*,op.pname from OG_USER u,OG_POST p,OG_R_USER_POST up,OG_PERSON op where p.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' and u.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' and u.USERID = up.USERID and UP.POSTID = p.POSTID and u.PID = op.pid
and p.POSTID = #{postId}

select p.memo, p.pid, p.pname, p.birthplace, p.email, p.address, p.birthday, p.orgId, p.edu, p.sex, p.mobil_phone, p.phone, p.position, p.leader, p.p_order, p.p_flag, p.INVALIDATION_MARK, o.orgname from og_person p left join OG_ORG o on p.orgid = o.orgid where p.pid = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select p.memo, p.pid, p.pname, p.birthplace, p.email, p.address, p.birthday, p.orgId, p.edu, p.sex, p.mobil_phone, p.phone, p.position, p.invalidation_mark, p.leader, p.p_order, p.p_flag from og_person p LEFT JOIN OG_ORG o on p.orgId = o.orgId where p.orgId = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from og_person where pid in
#{pid}
mapper.select: select p.memo, p.pid, p.pname, p.birthplace, p.email, p.address, p.birthday, p.orgId, p.edu, p.sex, p.mobil_phone, p.phone, p.position, p.leader, p.p_order, p.p_flag, p.invalidation_mark, o.orgname from og_person p left join OG_ORG o on p.orgid = o.orgid where p.invalidation_mark = '0' and p.pid = #{pId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select p.memo, p.pid, p.pname, p.birthplace, p.email, p.address, p.birthday, p.orgId, p.edu, p.sex, p.mobil_phone, p.phone, p.position, p.leader, p.p_order, p.p_flag, p.invalidation_mark, o.orgname from og_person p left join OG_ORG o on p.orgid = o.orgid where p.invalidation_mark = '1' and p.pid = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT P .memo, P .pid, P .pname, P .birthplace, P .email, P .address, P .birthday, P .orgId, P .edu, P .sex, P .mobil_phone, P .phone, P .position, P .invalidation_mark, P .leader, P .p_order, P .p_flag FROM OG_PERSON P, OG_ORG o, OG_ROLE r WHERE P .orgId = o.orgId AND P .orgId= #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1' AND r.rid = '8300'

select pe.* from OG_R_USER_POST up left join og_user u on up.userid = u.userid left join og_post op on up.postid = op.postid left join og_person pe on pe.pid = u.pid where op.postid in ('0011', '0016')

select p.pid, p.pname, p.leader, p.email from og_person p left join og_user u on p.pid = u.userid where 1=1
and p.orgid = #{orgId}

SELECT p.memo, p.pid, p.pname, p.birthplace, p.email, p.address, p.birthday, p.orgId, p.edu, p.sex, p.mobil_phone, p.phone, p.position, p.leader, p.p_order, p.p_flag, p.invalidation_mark, o.orgname FROM og_person p left join OG_ORG o on p.orgid = o.orgid where p.invalidation_mark = '1' and p.pid in (SELECT userid FROM og_r_user_post WHERE 1 = 1 and postid = #{rId} )

SELECT p.pid, p.pname, p.orgid FROM og_person p where p.invalidation_mark = '1'
AND p.orgId = #{orgId}
select u.userid,p.mobil_phone,p.email,u.username,p.pname from og_person p left join og_user u on p.pid=u.pid where u.userid = #{userid}
